onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} could never bring himself to follow such orders. He finds {Knight1} alone in her quarters, attempting to smuggle her out of the encampment that they were stationed in. {Knight1} insists that they bring the refugees along, as they would surely perish if they stayed. {Player} agrees, and together, the group makes a run for it. However, not all would go according to plan, as a couple of guards discover them just as they were about to leave. {Player} and {Knight1} end up having to fight their way out, staining their hands with {Kingdom#Adjective} blood.

A few months later, the two were seen again, leading a resistance army that opposed the kingdom of {Kingdom#Name}. Together, they stopped the crusade in its tracks, word of their defiance emboldening the defeated peoples who were enslaved by {Kingdom#Adjective} soldiers. The resistance would gain such traction that, even in {Capital1}, riots erupted advocating to end the crusades.

Years later, {Player} and {Knight1} would be hailed as liberators, saviours of the people who were oppressed under the {Kingdom#Adjective} regime.
